entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
